## HubInfoConfig interface

Base class for services providing hub information. We need a base class to be able to specify this service as injectable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HubInfoConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiUrl](./api.hubinfoconfig.apiurl.md) | <code>HubInfoUrlProvider</code> | URL to access the API layer<!-- -->Naming of this field according to the field in the rendering context |
|  [baseUrl](./api.hubinfoconfig.baseurl.md) | <code>HubInfoUrlProvider</code> | URL that represents the base URL of the path based routing of the application. This prefix will be preserved when generating and recognizing URLs. If this property is not configured, then it will be decoded from the window location. |
|  [cycleHandlingStrategy](./api.hubinfoconfig.cyclehandlingstrategy.md) | <code>CYCLE_HANDLING &#124; string</code> | Optionally specify how the SDK is supposed to deal with cyclic references in the content data structure. Per default the rendering context will break cycles by representing the duplicate element in a reference path by an unresolved reference. When configuring the strategy to [CYCLE\_HANDLING](./api.cycle_handling.md)<!-- -->.RESOLVE, the ContentrefComponent will use a resolved refence when rendering the context, instead of the unresolved reference. This bears the risk of an infinite loop during rendering. The actual rendering context objects will still not have cycles, so a JSON serialization of these objects will produce a valid result.<!-- -->Default is [CYCLE\_HANDLING](./api.cycle_handling.md)<!-- -->.BREAK |
|  [fetchLevels](./api.hubinfoconfig.fetchlevels.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of levels to fetch per request to the rendering context. If missing all levels will be fetched. |
|  [httpOptions](./api.hubinfoconfig.httpoptions.md) | <code>HttpResourceOptions</code> | Optionally specify how the SDK makes outbound requests |
|  [httpPreviewOptions](./api.hubinfoconfig.httppreviewoptions.md) | <code>HttpResourceOptions</code> | Optionally specify how the SDK makes outbound requests for the preview case |
|  [resourceUrl](./api.hubinfoconfig.resourceurl.md) | <code>HubInfoUrlProvider</code> | URL to access the delivery<!-- -->Naming of this field according to the field in the rendering context |
